DOC.brief_summary: This study design investigate whether protein supplementation improve recovery muscle function follow strenuous combination endurance resistance exercise . It specifically investigate effect protein supplementation recovery strength , power endurance exercise performance , along measure damage inflammation muscle .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Protein Supplementation Attenuating Decline Performance After Strenuous Concurrent Exercise
DOC.criteria: Understanding study procedure , restriction willingness participate evidenced voluntary inform consent form receive sign date copy inform consent form Male participant ; age 18 35 year , inclusive Well train endurance cyclist ( compete minimum Category 3 roadracing/estimated 10 mile TT < 23 minute ) , train history > 1 year Good general mental health Currently take nutritional supplement , polyphenols betablockers , Nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) , recreational drug Known suspected intolerance hypersensitivity study material state ingredient Allergy milk wheat product Heart medical condition may contraindicate participant take part high intensity exhaustive physical activity Previous participation study ; another clinical study receipt investigational drug within 30 day screen visit ; participation another study involve protocol elicit ExerciseInduced Muscle Damage ( EIMD ) within 6 month screen visit
